DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Women who use Actonel (risedronate) for osteopenia will show beneficial periodontal effects.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Actonel on Periodontal Health of Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: Women who use Actonel for osteopenia will show beneficial attachment loss, alveolar bone height and morphology as compared to those who do not when oral hygiene is corrected for.
